segments.text: I'm watching these two children, they're quite the pair of conspirators.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is trying to reach a cookie jar from a high cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small two-step stool, which looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fearful it's going to tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His legs are splayed, and it's leaning precariously backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below him, clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's reaching up with an open palm, anticipating a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amusing how focused they are on their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm quite surprised by their daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt or break anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like he's almost got one in his hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little scheme is almost complete.
segments.speaker: PAR
